ball.maven.plugins.javadoc

Class GenerateOptionsFileMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • ball.maven.plugins.javadoc.AbstractJavadocMojo
        • ball.maven.plugins.javadoc.GenerateOptionsFileMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextEnabled, Mojo

    @Mojo(name="generate-options-file",
      requiresDependencyResolution=RUNTIME,
      defaultPhase=GENERATE_SOURCES,
      requiresProject=true)
public class GenerateOptionsFileMojo
extends AbstractJavadocMojo
    Mojo to generate javadoc options file for maven-javadoc-plugin.
